title: Developer
desc: Designed user interface for online platform geared towards automating reward systems for insurance agents at HDFC Bank branches. Front-end functionalities were generated using JavaScript, Ajax, and jQuery.
Assisted in developing mailing interface directed towards broadcasting notices to Axis bank employees via the web-platform.

title: Intern
desc: Planned and launched a web platform which allows investors to interact with and invest in start-ups of their preference, and startups to display their value to investors.
Developed front-end and back-end technologies for the web-platform. Designed the user interface using HTML, CSS and PHP and maintained databases with help of MySQL.
